as.description: The element or component the Popover should render as.
as.description_zh: The element or component the Popover should render as.

:open.description: Whether or not the popover is open.
:open.description_zh: Whether or not the popover is open.

:close.description:
Closes the popover and refocuses Popover.Button. Optionally pass in a
ref or HTMLElement to focus that element instead.
:close.description_zh:
Closes the popover and refocuses Popover.Button. Optionally pass in a
ref or HTMLElement to focus that element instead.
